scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach run xylabs-build && yarn workspaces foreach version patch --deferred
scripts.deploy3: yarn cycle && yarn workspaces foreach run xylabs-build && yarn version apply --all && yarn workspaces foreach run xylabs-deploy3
scripts.deploy-major: yarn workspaces foreach version major --deferred && yarn deploy3
scripts.deploy-minor: yarn workspaces foreach version minor --deferred && yarn deploy3
scripts.deploy-patch: yarn workspaces foreach version patch --deferred && yarn deploy3
